PAGE_TITLE: Add Live Chat to a Website | FastComments
HERO_DESCRIPTION: Add Streaming, Live Chat to Your Site, Fast. Try out the live chat windows below.
INTRO_TWO_CHATS: Below you'll see two live chat windows to showcase how the live chat works. Try it out for yourself!
INTRO_ONE_CHAT: Below you'll see a live chat window to showcase how the live chat works. Try it out for yourself.
OUTRO_TEXT: Live Chat is completely customizable. In the above demo, we have Anonymous Commenting enabled, but we can require that a user actually logs in, or even use SSO. Custom styling can be applied, as well as all settings that the Live Commenting widget supports.
